channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Dynamics CRM Service Portal Web Resource
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Dynamics CRM Service Portal Web Resource

item.title: CVE-2024-38166|2024-08-16T19:12:45.775Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20crm%20service%20portal%20web%20resource
item.description: An unauthenticated attacker can exploit improper neutralization of input during web page generation in Microsoft Dynamics 365 to spoof over a network by tricking a user to click on a link.
